channel.title: How To Share With Other LAN Computers
channel.description:
Is there a preferred way to share directories between Whonix and non-Whonix computers on the LAN?
Also, would these recommendations be different if using Qubes-Whonix?
Thank you.

item.title: How To Share With Other LAN Computers
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Sure, as Long as These files aren’t in any way critical, you ideally trust the Network and use proper encryption it shouldn’t be that much of an issue, as far as I’m concerned.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: How To Share With Other LAN Computers

item.title: How To Share With Other LAN Computers
item.dc:creator: randy
item.description:
Right. I misunderstood. One could move files and then disconnect?

Read full topic
item.source: How To Share With Other LAN Computers

item.title: How To Share With Other LAN Computers
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Just for reference, the easiest way to accomplish this with VBox would be to use the Mount function with a Folder shared across the Network. Keep in mind though that this may severely weaken security and that it greatly differs depending on your host OS.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
